nodes.text: An engineered biological by-product, porrh was used by members of the Yuuzhan Vong species to sterilize wounds. In 28 ABY, former Executor Nom Anor used a porrh wash to sterilize a leg injury the Shamed One Kunra had received on the planet Coruscant.

Porrh first appeared in the novel The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic I: Remnant, written by Sean Williams and Shane Dix and released in 2003. It received an entry for itself in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, which was put out in 2008.
